newsletter.modalContent:
Sign up for Curtis email to keep updated on new products, great offers, and company news.

To subscribe to Curtis email, please fill in the required fields:

curtisCarePopover:
We believe in delivering products and services in a way that exemplifies our core values of Quality, Service, Integrity, and Caring.


Prompt & Professional Service

Outstanding customer service is a top priority for every team member at L.N. Curtis & sons. We consider our customers as partners, and endeavor to establish long-term relationships based on education, quality products and services, and ethical behavior.


Tools for Heroes

Whenever the call comes, you respond selflessly with focus and determination. You educate and train so that when the time comes, you will be ready. We consider what you do to be the work of heroes. L.N. Curtis & sons is committed to providing you, our hero customer, with high quality, integrity, and service in every interaction.

We care about our customers, our team members, our suppliers, and our communities-we have been this way since 1929. How may we support you?

creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo: We take all reasonable steps to protect our customer's personal information against loss, misuse and alteration. We use encryption technology whenever receiving and transferring your personal information on our site. When you are viewing a page that is requesting personal information, the URL in the address bar at top of your browser will start with "https". This indicates your transaction session is secured through Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). If the web page you are viewing does not start with "https", please contact us.
creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle: 3-digit code displayed on the back of Visa or MasterCard, or the 4-digit code on the front of American Express

cookieWarningBanner.message: To provide a better shopping experience, our website uses cookies. Continuing use of the site implies consent.

paymentmethods.description: This company allows both private individuals and businesses to accept payments over the Internet

customerServiceForm.confirmation: Thank you for submitting your message. Our customer service team will respond within 24 hours during a normal work week, but feel free to contact us at 877.488.0469 for immediate assistance Monday thru Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Pacific Time (PT).
